name: Amira's blessing
description:
Amira's Blessing is an adventure game featuring a boy who can travel back in time and change the past.

The game is set in an unnamed land as the Hebrews travel in search of the Promised Land(per the story of Exodus). The player plays as Micah, the game’s protagonist, atwelve-year-old Hebrew boy living with his mother and grandmother twenty years afterMoses led the Hebrews across the Red Sea.In the game, Micah can interact with other characters such as Talia (his best friend), Batya(his grandmother), and Asher (a father figure to Micah). He can also navigate and lightlyinteract with the world around him, such as lighting a candle at a ceremony, or using hisshepherd’s rod to herd his family’s flock of sheep.

It's a class project for CTIN 541.
